comment:
* Contains fields required for archived package installation,
 * i.e. installation without an APK.

variables.name: mPackageName
variables.comment: Name of the package as used to identify it in the system

variables.name: mSigningInfo
variables.comment: Signing certificates used to sign the package.

variables.name: mVersionCode
variables.comment:
* The version number of the package, as specified by the <manifest>tag's
     * {@link android.R.styleable#AndroidManifest_versionCode versionCode} attribute.

variables.name: mVersionCodeMajor
variables.comment:
* The major version number of the package, as specified by the <manifest>tag's
     * {@link android.R.styleable#AndroidManifest_versionCode versionCodeMajor} attribute.

variables.name: mTargetSdkVersion
mDefaultToDeviceProtectedStorage
mRequestLegacyExternalStorage
variables.comment:
* If {@code true} this app would like to run under the legacy storage model. Specified by the
     * <manifest> tag's
     * {@link android.R.styleable#AndroidManifestApplication_requestLegacyExternalStorage}
     * attribute.

variables.name: mUserDataFragile
variables.comment:
* If {@code true} the user is prompted to keep the app's data on uninstall. Specified by the
     * <manifest> tag's
     * {@link android.R.styleable#AndroidManifestApplication_hasFragileUserData} attribute.

variables.name: mLauncherActivities
variables.comment:
* List of the package's activities that specify {@link Intent#ACTION_MAIN} and
     * {@link Intent#CATEGORY_LAUNCHER}.
     * @see LauncherApps#getActivityList

methods.name: public String getPackageName()
methods.comment: * Name of the package as used to identify it in the system

methods.name: public SigningInfo getSigningInfo()
methods.comment: * Signing certificates used to sign the package.

methods.name: public int getVersionCode()
methods.comment:
* The version number of the package, as specified by the <manifest>tag's
     * {@link android.R.styleable#AndroidManifest_versionCode versionCode} attribute.

methods.name: public int getVersionCodeMajor()
methods.comment:
* The major version number of the package, as specified by the <manifest>tag's
     * {@link android.R.styleable#AndroidManifest_versionCode versionCodeMajor} attribute.

methods.name: public int getTargetSdkVersion()
public String getDefaultToDeviceProtectedStorage()
public String getRequestLegacyExternalStorage()
methods.comment:
* If {@code true} this app would like to run under the legacy storage model. Specified by the
     * <manifest> tag's
     * {@link android.R.styleable#AndroidManifestApplication_requestLegacyExternalStorage}
     * attribute.

methods.name: public String getUserDataFragile()
methods.comment:
* If {@code true} the user is prompted to keep the app's data on uninstall. Specified by the
     * <manifest> tag's
     * {@link android.R.styleable#AndroidManifestApplication_hasFragileUserData} attribute.

methods.name: public List<ArchivedActivityInfo> getLauncherActivities()
methods.comment:
* List of the package's activities that specify {@link Intent#ACTION_MAIN} and
     * {@link Intent#CATEGORY_LAUNCHER}.
     *
     * @see LauncherApps#getActivityList

methods.name: public ArchivedPackageInfo setPackageName(@NonNull String value)
methods.comment: * Name of the package as used to identify it in the system

methods.name: public ArchivedPackageInfo setSigningInfo(@NonNull SigningInfo value)
methods.comment: * Signing certificates used to sign the package.

methods.name: public ArchivedPackageInfo setVersionCode(int value)
methods.comment:
* The version number of the package, as specified by the <manifest>tag's
     * {@link android.R.styleable#AndroidManifest_versionCode versionCode} attribute.

methods.name: public ArchivedPackageInfo setVersionCodeMajor(int value)
methods.comment:
* The major version number of the package, as specified by the <manifest>tag's
     * {@link android.R.styleable#AndroidManifest_versionCode versionCodeMajor} attribute.

methods.name: public ArchivedPackageInfo setTargetSdkVersion(int value)
public ArchivedPackageInfo setDefaultToDeviceProtectedStorage(@NonNull String value)
public ArchivedPackageInfo setRequestLegacyExternalStorage(@NonNull String value)
methods.comment:
* If {@code true} this app would like to run under the legacy storage model. Specified by the
     * <manifest> tag's
     * {@link android.R.styleable#AndroidManifestApplication_requestLegacyExternalStorage}
     * attribute.

methods.name: public ArchivedPackageInfo setUserDataFragile(@NonNull String value)
methods.comment:
* If {@code true} the user is prompted to keep the app's data on uninstall. Specified by the
     * <manifest> tag's
     * {@link android.R.styleable#AndroidManifestApplication_hasFragileUserData} attribute.

methods.name: public ArchivedPackageInfo setLauncherActivities(@NonNull List<ArchivedActivityInfo> value)
methods.comment:
* List of the package's activities that specify {@link Intent#ACTION_MAIN} and
     * {@link Intent#CATEGORY_LAUNCHER}.
     *
     * @see LauncherApps#getActivityList
